tagline: Native by nature, authentic by choice.
gallery_Subtitle: Discover the magic of the Peruvian jungle through our unique experiences

tribes.title: Andean
tribes.subtitle: At Lulus Fashion Store, we work directly with indigenous communities from Peru, preserving their ancestral techniques and supporting their sustainable development.
tribes.quote: "Every journey with Nativo helps preserve ancestral techniques and supports the sustainable development of Andean communities."

matsigenka.name: Matsigenka
matsigenka.description: Ancestral guardians of Amazonian biodiversity and experts in traditional textile techniques with natural dyes.
matsigenka.products: Natural looms, organic dyes, ancestral patterns

marakaeri.name: Marakaeri
marakaeri.description: Indigenous people from the Manu region with a rich heritage in artisanal jewelry and traditional metallurgy techniques.
marakaeri.products: Silver jewelry, semi-precious stones, cultural symbols

qeros.name: Q'eros
qeros.description: Last direct descendants of the Incas, masters in millenary textile techniques and patterns with spiritual meaning.
qeros.products: Ceremonial garments, sacred symbols, high energy weavings

ashaninka.name: Ashaninka
ashaninka.description: Master weavers from the Peruvian Amazon who preserve ancestral techniques in every piece they create with dedication and respect.
ashaninka.products: Traditional embroidery, story weavings, unique garments

guia_local.name: Local Guides
guia_local.description: Cross-cultural communication and authentic experiences that enrich every encounter with our partner communities.
guia_local.products: Cultural tours, authentic experiences, genuine connections

collaboration.title: Our Collaboration with Communities
collaboration.description: We work directly with indigenous communities to create authentic experiences that respect their traditions and contribute to the sustainable development of their people. Our local guides are cultural bridges that facilitate meaningful and mutually enriching encounters.
collaboration.development_desc: 30% of profits allocated to local projects
collaboration.sustainable_desc: Responsible experiences that preserve culture and nature
collaboration.exchange_desc: Authentic encounters that enrich both parties

location.title: Visit us in
location.description: Find us at the Third Stop of San Sebasti√°n, just minutes from the center of Cusco
location.directionsText: From the Plaza de Armas of Cusco, take transportation to San Sebasti√°n (15 min). Get off at the Third Stop. We are located on the main avenue.
location.whyVisitTitle: Why visit us in San Sebasti√°n?
location.easyAccessDesc: Just 15 minutes from downtown Cusco with frequent transportation.
location.localCraftDesc: We work directly with artisans from San Sebasti√°n and surrounding communities.
location.directPricesDesc: Being close to the communities, we offer more affordable prices without intermediaries.
location.authenticityDesc: All our products are made by local artisans using traditional techniques.
location.howToGetTitle: How to get to our store
location.fromCenterDesc: Take a van with "San Sebasti√°n" sign (15 minutes)
location.taxiDesc: 10 minutes from Plaza de Armas (approximately S/ 8-10)
